vimeo.clientId: vimeo client id (available on vimeo application page https://developer.vimeo.com/apps)
vimeo.clientSecret: vimeo client secret (available on vimeo application page https://developer.vimeo.com/apps)
vimeo.accessToken: vimeo access token (available on vimeo application page https://developer.vimeo.com/apps)
